articles.title: 2 Red-Hot Growth Stocks to Buy in 2026
articles.mainIdea: 2 Red-Hot Growth Stocks to Buy in 2026
articles.summary: Motley Fool: 2 Red-Hot Growth Stocks to Buy in 2026. Figma and CoreWeave could head higher as the AI market expands. Related tickers mentioned: CRWV, FIG.

articles.title: Adobe Stock Rides on Expanding Partner Base: Is There More Upside?
articles.mainIdea: Adobe Stock Rides on Expanding Partner Base: Is There More Upside?
articles.summary: Zacks: Adobe Stock Rides on Expanding Partner Base: Is There More Upside?. ADBE's AI push gets a lift from deepening ties with Google, OpenAI and others, plus a strategic video tech deal with Runaway. Related tickers mentioned: AMZN, GOOG, GOOGL, MSFT, OPAI.PVT, SNAP.

articles.title: ADBE vs. GOOGL: Which AI-Driven Tech Stock Has an Edge Now?
articles.mainIdea: ADBE vs. GOOGL: Which AI-Driven Tech Stock Has an Edge Now?
articles.summary: Zacks: ADBE vs. GOOGL: Which AI-Driven Tech Stock Has an Edge Now?. Alphabet's AI momentum in Search and Cloud gives it an edge, while Adobe faces rising competition despite solid growth targets. Related tickers mentioned: GOOG, GOOGL.
